mapper.select: SELECT c.cateid, (c.catename) AS cate_catename, i.itemid, i.itemname, i.itemimg, i.itemplace,i.itemplace_address, i.lat, i.lng, i.itemguide, i.itemticket, i.estart, i.efin, i.rdate, (o.obj1) AS itemoption_obj1, (o.price1) AS itemoption_price1, (o.obj2) AS itemoption_obj2, (o.price2) AS itemoption_price2, (o.obj3) AS itemoption_obj3, (o.price3) AS itemoption_price3 FROM item AS i INNER JOIN cate AS c ON c.cateid=i.cateid INNER JOIN itemoption AS o ON o.itemid=i.itemid WHERE i.itemid=#{itemid}

SELECT c.cateid, (c.catename) AS cate_catename, i.itemid, i.itemname, i.itemimg, i.itemplace,i.itemplace_address, i.lat, i.lng, i.itemguide, i.itemticket, i.estart, i.efin, i.rdate, (o.obj1) AS itemoption_obj1, (o.price1) AS itemoption_price1, (o.obj2) AS itemoption_obj2, (o.price2) AS itemoption_price2, (o.obj3) AS itemoption_obj3, (o.price3) AS itemoption_price3 FROM item AS i INNER JOIN cate AS c ON c.cateid=i.cateid INNER JOIN itemoption AS o ON o.itemid=i.itemid
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET cateid=#{cateid}, itemname=#{itemname}, estart=#{estart}, efin=#{efin}, rdate=SYSDATE() WHERE itemid=#{itemid}
mapper.select: SELECT i.itemid, i.itemname, i.itemimg, i.estart, i.efin, round(avg(r.reviewgrade), 1) as review_reviewgrade FROM item i INNER JOIN review r ON i.itemid = r.itemid GROUP BY i.itemid ORDER BY review_reviewgrade DESC LIMIT 6;
